text: Hi Atharv Bro!!! I still remember that day when gunjan asked me to come to the TA-202 group and man there I met you and the gang. I have made so many fun memories with you whether be going out for dinner, troubling atul(which is the best) or just sitting around you in the class. You also helped me with so many assignments and I cant thank you enough for that .Your work ethic is just so great and I know you will do awesome things in your life. Lets meet soon and Always stay happy in your life!!!
author: Harshit  Garg

text: Hi bro!!! I still remember TA 202 was when we became such good friends. Kitne mazze kiye tha humne usme. From talking about football to helping you pass in your exams we have made so many memories. Bohot mehnat karvata tha tu. But I have had so much fun around you and the gang I cant stress enough. Kitne plans tha humare intern ke covid ne kharab kar diye. But koi na jaldi hi milte hai vaapis phir sab karenge. I wish you the best for your future bro and always stay happy!!!
author: Harshit  Garg

text: Hi bro!!! Cant emphasize enough how much good you are. You ,me and dewansh have had such great memories together whether it be playing basketball, doing coding and watching movies and BBT. Us supporting Barca together(them disappointing us always).I have never seen someone so lively and energetic as you. I have had tremendous fun around you and learnt so much from you and cant thank you enough for that. Lets meet soon and I hope the best for your future. Always stay happy!!!
author: Harshit  Garg

text: Hi bro!!! We have had so much fun that it is difficult to recall all of them. From playing late night basketball to literally spending my whole day at your room. Bohot pareshan kiya hai maine tereko but kya karun mazza hi itna aata tha. Har samay tereko canteen jaane ka bolta tha aur kisi tarah le hi jaata tha. Fest mein kitna fun kiya hum logo ne chahe kanpur mein ho ya delhi. You were also so good to me always and I cant thank you enough for that. Ab aage ke liye apna dhyan rakhna aur khush rahna hamesha aur jaldi hi milte hai.
author: Harshit  Garg

text: Hi bro!!!! We have had so many memories together. The first that comes to my mind has to be codefundo. The trip to hyderabad was so fun with you and madhur. You did all the work and me, Madhur just tagged along. Besides it our constant harkate at dewansh room and both of us pulling his leg were so fun. Your nature is so good and damn you are very hardworking varna MTX thodi milta bro ko.(ab paise hi paise). Your fights with naman were so entertaining to watch that I never broke u too up.(sorry for that) But at the end you were a great friend and I hope we meet soon. Always be happy aur bhabhi milte hi batana zarur okay!!!!
author: Harshit  Garg
